reporting.reporttable.TableQuery:
IF @FromDate <= @ToDate BEGIN /* Trims the value of @FromDate to be able to display hours in the table. */ SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'hour');
/* Selects the number of orders created in the given hours. */ SELECT [Date] AS '{$ecommerce.report_hour$}', COUNT(OrderDate) AS '{$ecommerce.report_numberoforders$}' FROM -- returns a column of dates, each hour in a new row {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'hour') AS Dates LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON ([Date] <= OrderDate AND DATEADD(HOUR,1,[Date]) > OrderDate) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID GROUP BY [Date] ORDER BY [Date] DESC END
